title: Линия судьбы
overview: On the eve of the wedding, Vera jokingly comes to a fortune teller, but the prediction she receives turns the girl's life upside down. The wedding is cancelled, and Vera herself begins searching for a mysterious stranger whose fate is inextricably linked with her own. Mysterious coincidences, curses and karma... In the end, everything will find a rational explanation. Everything except love. After all, in the history of a real great feeling there is always a place for magic.
